## ShortcutRegistry.modifierKeys property

Enum of valid modifiers.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static modifierKeys: {
        Shift: KeyCodes;
        Control: KeyCodes;
        Alt: KeyCodes;
        Meta: KeyCodes;
    };
```
